Class ConfigChooser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.tangram.ConfigChooser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.EGLConfigChooser

    public class ConfigChooser
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.EGLConfigChooser
    ConfigChooser is a convenience class for configuring a GLSurfaceView.
